description: Supine RDI at 4% oxygen desaturation  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in supine body position associated with >= 4% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp4 + hnrbp4 + carbp4 + canbp4 + oarbp4 + oanbp4 ) / ( remepbp + nremepbp )

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Supine RDI at 4% oxygen desaturation
